# TSPS - One Financial Specialist, Senior (Life Cycle Costing)

## Procurement Announcement

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

* **Solicitation Number:** W6381-23-0005/A
* **Publication Date:** 2022-12-12
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-17T14:00:00
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-01-09

The Department of National Defence issues this Request for Proposal (RFP) for a single Financial Specialist, Senior, with expertise in Life Cycle Cost Estimate (LCCE) to support the engineering management of complex defence projects.

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

### Description of Work

The Financial Specialist will develop policies, procedures, training, and tools in the domain of LCCE, as well as review and assess LCCE business requirements and LCCE for Materiel Acquisition and Support (MA&S) Practitioners.

### Security Requirements

This procurement is subject to the Controlled Goods Program and security requirements, as outlined in Part 6 - Security, Financial and Other Requirements and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses.

### Procurement Strategy

This procurement is conditionally set-aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business, if two or more bids are received from certified Indigenous Businesses listed in the Indigenous Services Canada's Indigenous Business Directory.

### Submissions

Submissions must be received by 14:00 hours (EST) on January 17, 2023. All tender documents and mandatory requirements will be provided in the Request for Proposal (RFP) package. Any questions or concerns must be addressed to the Contracting Authority, Dennis Lam at dennis.lam@forces.gc.ca.

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Contact Information:
- **Name:** Dennis Lam
- **Email:** dennis.lam@forces.gc.ca
- **Phone:** 613-219-5185
